query_2MASS module¶

Created on Tue Aug 13 10:31:33 2019 @author: Nicholas Vieira @query_2MASS.py

query_2MASS.geturl(ra, dec, size=150, filters='A')¶

Get the URL(s) for some reference image(s) to download from the 2-Micron All Sky Survey (2MASS) archive.

Parameters:
  • ra, dec (float) – RA and Dec of interest
  • size (float, optional) – Size of the cutout image in pixels (1 pix == 4.0” in 2MASS; default 150)
  • filters (str, optional) – Photometric filter of choice (default ‘A’ –> all; options are ‘A’, ‘J’, ‘H’, ‘K’ - see notes for details)
Returns:

List of URL(s) to download the relevant fits files
Return type:

list

Notes

Options for filters are ‘A’ –> all, ‘J’ for only J-band, ‘H’ for H-band, and ‘K’ for K-band.

See: https://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/applications/2MASS/IM/docs/siahelp.html
